search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Float (float.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: Here is the official pricing page for Float: [https://www.float.com/pricing](https://www.float.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.

Custom contract

Service Level Agreement (SLA)

Manual payments

Priority support and onboarding

How does the free trial work?

Try Float for free for 30 days with full access to all of our awesome features — no strings attached!

What types of payment do you accept?

We accept Visa, Mastercard, and American Express. Subscription fees are debited from your account each billing period. Check and wire payments are available on an Enterprise plan.

Do you offer discounts for non-profits?

We offer a 10% discount to all 501(c)(3) non-profit organizations and others who qualify as charities (subject to verification). Get in touch with [support@float.com](mailto:support@float.com).

Do you offer volume discounts?

Sure do! Contact us at [sales@float.com](mailto:sales@float.com) with information about your team size.

Have more questions?

We’d be happy to answer them. [Contact](https://www.float.com/contact) our friendly support team today!

Pricing is based on the number of people you schedule with Starter, Pro, and Enterprise plan options. Try a 30-day free trial with access to 24 hour/5 day support.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Pricing is based on the number of people scheduled, with discounts for annual billing and non-profits.

features: A dedicated account manager for onboarding & training
